title: 求解决一个服务端的问题
author: Nitric_acid
txt_content:

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: MessageBarAPI不太支持你的服务端，建议降级插件版本或者选择其他可以实现相同功能的插件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
试着更新下这个插件呢 MessageBarAPI

https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/barapi
